attributes.action: Bring Home ALL of OUR SOLDIERS from conflicts that dont concern us
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BRAVE people who make up the armed forces in this country should not have to fight battles and wars that don't concern us, our main priority is self preservation.
Historically we have, for a small island been a strong and powerful people, full of ideas, inventions and commerce; family values and traditions; a force to be reckoned with in the face of adversity !!
Whatever happened to Great Britain?
BRING OUR BRAVE TROOPS HOME!! keep them trained and efficient, look after them as they will us one day !!
Put our forces into Border Control, keep out the VERY PEOPLE and things that threaten our somewhat politically CRIPPLED society and lets put the GREAT back in BRITAIN !!! I Thank ALL that read this and hope you will sign;
regards, 
simon,
a workin class secondary educated tax payer

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
